Subject: Critical issue: Critical frontend issue in web-app (us-west-2)

Automated detection from monitoring system:

A critical performance issue has been detected in the web application service located in the us-west-2 region. The analysis indicates a high load time of 5121.03 ms, which may be attributed to a large bundle size of 674.85 kb and inefficient resource loading. This issue affects the performance for users in this region, particularly impacting customer cust_00094. Customers may experience slow page loads, leading to frustration and potential abandonment of the application. The issue is recurring and requires immediate attention.

Service: web-app
Region: us-west-2
Severity: critical
Event Type: frontend

Metrics:
{
  "load_time_ms": 5121.03,
  "bundle_size_kb": 674.85,
  "resources_loaded": 36
}

Workaround: Investigate and optimize the frontend bundle size and resource loading strategy. Consider implementing lazy loading for resources and reviewing server response times. Customer notification is required.

This ticket was auto-generated by the AI monitoring system.
